title: Business Lead Output Schema
description: Structured dataset of business leads collected from Google Maps for a specific sector and location.

website.title: Website
website.description: Official business website URL, if available.

address.title: Address
address.description: Full business address from Google Maps.

reviewCount.title: Review count
reviewCount.description: Total number of Google Maps reviews.

googleMapsUrl.title: Google Maps URL
googleMapsUrl.description: Direct link to the business on Google Maps.

searchQuery.title: Search query
searchQuery.description: The search query used to find this business.
